Name: Sathiya Kumar
AboutMe:
Sathiya Kumar V M - By profession I'm a .Net/MS SQL Server Developer but my passion is always SEO :). Started my career in 2012 @ContempoTech(Search Engine Genie) a startup company gave me a good platform for my SEO career. With the 1 year experience I joined Sulekha New Media Pvt ltd(Sulekha.com) where I learned SEO as well as SEM. Later I got a chance to join Servion Global Solutions as Engineer. Currently doing .NET and SQL Server development @Servion :)

I love to Contribute to Stack Exchange sites especially on Pro Webmasters as I love SEO. I love editing, flagging and answering questions. @2013 I tried to become a Moderator @ProWebmasters but didn't get a chance :( but still contributing to the site as a normal user or we can say Unofficial Moderator :-P
